name: Buddy Bot
description:
You play as a robot in a strange facility who just acquired the powers of a hero! Try and make your way to the end of the factory without being found by the Drones!

Controls:

  • WASD to move and aim
  • Left mouse button to place a bomb - this will distract drones
  • Right mouse button to rocket impulse! this will shoot you in the opposite direction of where you aim
  • Space to jump

The aim of the game is to find the button in the level which will unlock the door to the exit!
